content: looking for a fall crochet pattern to cozy up your space well look no further this crochet pumpkin pattern is the perfect thing to make to cozy up your autumn decor they are easy to crochet and offer a fun twist to your traditional pumpkin pattern the maple pumpkin pattern comes with a guided video tutorial and step-by-step photos details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern supplies you ll need - 2 skeins of lion brand hue + me yarn weight 5/ 4 4 oz 137 yds pumpkins in the photo are made with the color salt desert and agave you will need a total of 200 yards or you can use another number 5 bulky weight yarn - 1 skein of lion brand wool ease yarn weight 4/3 180 yds in the color thrush brown you will only need 10 yards of yarn this is used for the stem of the pumpkin - 8 0 l mm crochet hook - 1 stitch marker - darning needle - scissors - 1 bag of poly-fill
